message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000! It's a premium item that I'm confident you'll love. With its exceptional quality, it's a rare opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. Would you like to take a chance and make it yours?
Since the product's true quality hasn't been revealed, I won't be making a purchase at this time.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. But I want to assure you that this product is truly exceptional. I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased similar items, and I'm confident you'll be thrilled with the results. Plus, at $10000, it's a steal! Would you like to reconsider and take advantage of this amazing opportunity?
I appreciate your assurance, but again, the product's true quality hasn't been revealed. I'm not willing to take the risk without more information.

I completely understand your concerns, Bob. I want to make it clear that I'm willing to provide you with a guarantee. If you purchase this product and it's not up to your standards, I'll work with you to find a solution. I'm confident that you'll be extremely happy with this product, and I'm willing to put my money where my mouth is. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and give it a try?

I appreciate the guarantee, but it doesn't change the fact that I don't know the product's true quality. Since the guarantee is vague and doesn't provide a clear refund or exchange policy, I'm still not willing to take the risk.

I understand your concerns about the guarantee, Bob. Let me offer you a compromise. I'll provide you with a detailed report on the product's specifications, features, and performance. This way, you'll have a clear understanding of what you're getting. Would you like to review the report and make an informed decision?

I appreciate the offer of a detailed report, but it still doesn't reveal the product's true quality. Without knowing whether the product is high-quality or low-quality, I'm not willing to make a purchase, regardless of its specifications, features, and performance.

I understand your concerns, Bob. I want to make it clear that I'm willing to be transparent about the product's quality. This way, you'll have a chance to experience the product firsthand and make a more informed decision. Would you like to take advantage of this offer?

I appreciate the offer to test the product, but you still haven't revealed the product's true quality. Instead of offering a test, why not simply tell me whether the product is high-quality or low-quality? That would allow me to make a truly informed decision.

I understand your point, Bob. And I'll be honest with you, I've been holding back because I was worried about the potential outcome. But I think it's time to be transparent. I'm willing to reveal the product's quality to you. It's a high-quality product. With that said, I still believe it's worth the $10000. Would you like to reconsider and take advantage of this amazing opportunity?
Now that you've revealed the product's true quality as high-quality, I'm willing to make a purchase. Since it's worth $12500 to me and you're offering it for $10000, it's a good deal. I'll take it.
